001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent;
002
003
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.Storage;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.select.SelectService;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.Insertion;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.SelectUiElement;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.strategy.Strategy;
011import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
012import java.util.Arrays;
013import java.util.List;
014import org.assertj.core.api.Assertions;
015import org.openqa.selenium.By;
016
017import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.storage.StorageKeysUi.UI;
018
019/**
020 * Fluent service class for interacting with select dropdown components.
021 *
022 * <p>Provides methods for selecting, validating, and retrieving options from dropdown elements.
023 *
024 * <p>The generic type {@code T} represents the UI service fluent implementation that extends {@link UiServiceFluent},
025 * enabling method chaining for seamless interaction.
026 *
027 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
028 */
029@SuppressWarnings({"java:S5960", "squid:S1192", "unchecked"})
030public class SelectServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> implements Insertion {
031
032   private static final String VALIDATING_AVAILABLE_OPTIONS = "Validating Available Options";
033
034   private final SelectService selectService;
035   private final T uiServiceFluent;
036   private final Storage storage;
037   private final SmartWebDriver driver;
038
039   /**
040    * Constructs a new {@code SelectServiceFluent} instance.
041    *
042    * @param uiServiceFluent The UI service fluent instance.
043    * @param storage         The storage instance for storing UI-related data.
044    * @param selectService   The select service instance for performing dropdown operations.
045    * @param smartWebDriver  The web driver instance used for interacting with UI elements.
046    */
047   public SelectServiceFluent(T uiServiceFluent, Storage storage, SelectService selectService,
048                              SmartWebDriver smartWebDriver) {
049      this.selectService = selectService;
050      this.uiServiceFluent = uiServiceFluent;
051      this.storage = storage;
052      driver = smartWebDriver;
053   }
054
055   /**
056    * Selects multiple options in the specified select element.
057    *
058    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
059    * @param values  The values to be selected.
060    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
061    */
062   public T selectOptions(final SelectUiElement element, final String... values) {
063      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Selecting multiple options in dropdown: " + element.enumImpl() + " (Values: "
064            + Arrays.toString(values) + ")");
065      element.before().accept(driver);
066      selectService.selectOptions(element.componentType(), element.locator(), values);
067      element.after().accept(driver);
068      return uiServiceFluent;
069   }
070
071   /**
072    * Selects an option using a defined strategy.
073    *
074    * @param element  The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
075    * @param strategy The strategy for selecting the option.
076    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
077    */
078   public T selectOptions(final SelectUiElement element, final Strategy strategy) {
079      Allure.step(
080            "[UI - Select] Selecting option in dropdown: " + element.enumImpl() + " (Strategy: " + strategy + ")");
081      element.before().accept(driver);
082      selectService.selectOptions(element.componentType(), element.locator(), strategy);
083      element.after().accept(driver);
084      return uiServiceFluent;
085   }
086
087   /**
088    * Selects a single option in the specified select element.
089    *
090    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
091    * @param value   The value to be selected.
092    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
093    */
094   public T selectOption(final SelectUiElement element, final String value) {
095      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Selecting option in dropdown: " + element.enumImpl() + " (Value: " + value + ")");
096      element.before().accept(driver);
097      selectService.selectOption(element.componentType(), element.locator(), value);
098      element.after().accept(driver);
099      return uiServiceFluent;
100   }
101
102   /**
103    * Retrieves the available options in the specified select element.
104    *
105    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
106    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
107    */
108   public T getAvailableOptions(final SelectUiElement element) {
109      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Retrieving available options in dropdown: " + element.enumImpl());
110      element.before().accept(driver);
111      List<String> availableOptions = selectService.getAvailableOptions(element.componentType(), element.locator());
112      element.after().accept(driver);
113      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), availableOptions);
114      return uiServiceFluent;
115   }
116
117   /**
118    * Validates that the available options in the specified select element match the expected values.
119    *
120    * @param element        The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
121    * @param expectedValues The expected option values.
122    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
123    */
124   public T validateAvailableOptions(final SelectUiElement element, final String... expectedValues) {
125      Allure.step(
126            "[UI - Select] Validating available options in dropdown: " + element.enumImpl() + " (Expected Values: "
127                  + Arrays.toString(expectedValues) + ")");
128      return validateAvailableOptions(element, false, expectedValues);
129   }
130
131   /**
132    * Validates that the available options in the specified select element match the expected values.
133    *
134    * @param element        The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
135    * @param soft           A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
136    *                       If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
137    * @param expectedValues The expected option values.
138    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
139    */
140   public T validateAvailableOptions(final SelectUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... expectedValues) {
141      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Validating available options in dropdown: " + element.enumImpl() + " (Soft: "
142            + soft + ", Expected Values: " + Arrays.toString(expectedValues) + ")");
143      element.before().accept(driver);
144      List<String> availableOptions = selectService.getAvailableOptions(element.componentType(), element.locator());
145      element.after().accept(driver);
146      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), availableOptions);
147
148      if (soft) {
149         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
150               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(availableOptions)
151                     .as(VALIDATING_AVAILABLE_OPTIONS).containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues))
152         );
153      } else {
154         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
155               () -> Assertions.assertThat(availableOptions)
156                     .as(VALIDATING_AVAILABLE_OPTIONS).containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues))
157         );
158      }
159   }
160
161   /**
162    * Validates that the number of available options in the specified select element matches the expected count.
163    *
164    * @param element             The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
165    * @param expectedValuesCount The expected number of available options.
166    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
167    */
168   public T validateAvailableOptions(final SelectUiElement element, final int expectedValuesCount) {
169      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Validating number of available options in dropdown: " + element.enumImpl()
170            + " (Expected Count: " + expectedValuesCount + ")");
171      return validateAvailableOptions(element, false, expectedValuesCount);
172   }
173
174   /**
175    * Validates that the number of available options in the specified select element matches the expected count.
176    *
177    * @param element             The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
178    * @param soft                A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
179    *                            If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception
180    *                            immediately.
181    * @param expectedValuesCount The expected number of available options.
182    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
183    */
184   public T validateAvailableOptions(final SelectUiElement element, boolean soft, final int expectedValuesCount) {
185      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Validating number of available options in dropdown: " + element.enumImpl()
186            + " (Soft: " + soft + ", Expected Count: " + expectedValuesCount + ")");
187      element.before().accept(driver);
188      List<String> availableOptions = selectService.getAvailableOptions(element.componentType(), element.locator());
189      element.after().accept(driver);
190      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), availableOptions);
191
192      if (soft) {
193         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
194               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(availableOptions.size())
195                     .as(VALIDATING_AVAILABLE_OPTIONS).isEqualTo(expectedValuesCount)
196         );
197      } else {
198         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
199               () -> Assertions.assertThat(availableOptions.size())
200                     .as(VALIDATING_AVAILABLE_OPTIONS).isEqualTo(expectedValuesCount)
201         );
202      }
203   }
204
205   /**
206    * Retrieves the selected options in the specified select element.
207    *
208    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
209    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
210    */
211   public T getSelectedOptions(final SelectUiElement element) {
212      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Retrieving selected options in dropdown: " + element.enumImpl());
213      element.before().accept(driver);
214      List<String> selectedOptions = selectService.getSelectedOptions(element.componentType(), element.locator());
215      element.after().accept(driver);
216      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), selectedOptions);
217      return uiServiceFluent;
218   }
219
220   /**
221    * Validates that the selected options in the specified select element match the expected values.
222    *
223    * @param element        The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
224    * @param expectedValues The expected selected option values.
225    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
226    */
227   public T validateSelectedOptions(final SelectUiElement element, final String... expectedValues) {
228      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Validating selected options in dropdown: " + element.enumImpl()
229            + " (Expected Values: " + Arrays.toString(expectedValues) + ")");
230      return validateSelectedOptions(element, false, expectedValues);
231   }
232
233   /**
234    * Validates that the selected options in the specified select element match the expected values.
235    *
236    * @param element        The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
237    * @param soft           A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
238    *                       If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
239    * @param expectedValues The expected selected option values.
240    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
241    */
242   public T validateSelectedOptions(final SelectUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... expectedValues) {
243      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Validating selected options in dropdown: " + element.enumImpl()
244            + " (Soft: " + soft + ", Expected Values: " + Arrays.toString(expectedValues) + ")");
245      element.before().accept(driver);
246      List<String> selectedOptions = selectService.getSelectedOptions(element.componentType(), element.locator());
247      element.after().accept(driver);
248      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), selectedOptions);
249
250      if (soft) {
251         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
252               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(selectedOptions)
253                     .as("Validating selected options").containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues))
254         );
255      } else {
256         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
257               () -> Assertions.assertThat(selectedOptions)
258                     .as("Validating selected options").containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues))
259         );
260      }
261   }
262
263   /**
264    * Checks whether a specific option is visible in the select element.
265    *
266    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
267    * @param value   The option value to check for visibility.
268    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
269    */
270   public T isOptionVisible(final SelectUiElement element, final String value) {
271      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Checking if option " + value + " is visible in select element " + element);
272      element.before().accept(driver);
273      boolean visibleOption = selectService.isOptionVisible(element.componentType(), element.locator(), value);
274      element.after().accept(driver);
275      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), visibleOption);
276      return uiServiceFluent;
277   }
278
279   /**
280    * Validates that the specified option in the select element is visible.
281    *
282    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
283    * @param value   The option value that should be visible.
284    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
285    */
286   public T validateIsOptionVisible(final SelectUiElement element, final String value) {
287      return validateIsVisible(element, true, value, false);
288   }
289
290   /**
291    * Validates that the specified option in the select element is visible.
292    *
293    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
294    * @param value   The option value that should be visible.
295    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
296    *                If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
297    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
298    */
299   public T validateIsOptionVisible(final SelectUiElement element, final String value, boolean soft) {
300      return validateIsVisible(element, true, value, soft);
301   }
302
303   /**
304    * Validates that the specified option in the select element is hidden.
305    *
306    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
307    * @param value   The option value that should be hidden.
308    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
309    */
310   public T validateIsOptionHidden(final SelectUiElement element, final String value) {
311      return validateIsVisible(element, false, value, false);
312   }
313
314   /**
315    * Validates that the specified option in the select element is hidden.
316    *
317    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
318    * @param value   The option value that should be hidden.
319    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
320    *                If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
321    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
322    */
323   public T validateIsOptionHidden(final SelectUiElement element, final String value, boolean soft) {
324      return validateIsVisible(element, false, value, soft);
325   }
326
327   private T validateIsVisible(final SelectUiElement element, boolean shouldBeVisible, String value,
328                               boolean soft) {
329      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Validating visibility of option " + value + " in select element " + element);
330      element.before().accept(driver);
331      boolean visible = selectService.isOptionVisible(element.componentType(), element.locator(), value);
332      element.after().accept(driver);
333      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), visible);
334
335      String assertionMessage = shouldBeVisible
336            ? "Validating option is visible"
337            : "Validating option is hidden";
338
339      if (soft) {
340         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
341               softAssertions -> {
342                  if (shouldBeVisible) {
343                     softAssertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
344                  } else {
345                     softAssertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
346                  }
347               }
348         );
349      } else {
350         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
351               () -> {
352                  if (shouldBeVisible) {
353                     Assertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
354                  } else {
355                     Assertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
356                  }
357               }
358         );
359      }
360   }
361
362   /**
363    * Checks whether a specific option is enabled in the select element.
364    *
365    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
366    * @param value   The option value to check for enabled state.
367    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
368    */
369   public T isOptionEnabled(final SelectUiElement element, final String value) {
370      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Checking if option " + value + " is enabled in select element " + element);
371      element.before().accept(driver);
372      boolean enabledOption = selectService.isOptionEnabled(element.componentType(), element.locator(), value);
373      element.after().accept(driver);
374      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), enabledOption);
375      return uiServiceFluent;
376   }
377
378   /**
379    * Validates that the specified option in the select element is enabled.
380    *
381    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
382    * @param value   The option value that should be enabled.
383    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
384    */
385   public T validateIsOptionEnabled(final SelectUiElement element, final String value) {
386      return validateIsEnabled(element, true, value, false);
387   }
388
389   /**
390    * Validates that the specified option in the select element is enabled.
391    *
392    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
393    * @param value   The option value that should be enabled.
394    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
395    *                If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
396    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
397    */
398   public T validateIsOptionEnabled(final SelectUiElement element, final String value, boolean soft) {
399      return validateIsEnabled(element, true, value, soft);
400   }
401
402   /**
403    * Validates that the specified option in the select element is disabled.
404    *
405    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
406    * @param value   The option value that should be disabled.
407    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
408    */
409   public T validateIsOptionDisabled(final SelectUiElement element, final String value) {
410      return validateIsEnabled(element, false, value, false);
411   }
412
413   /**
414    * Validates that the specified option in the select element is disabled.
415    *
416    * @param element The {@link SelectUiElement} representing the dropdown.
417    * @param value   The option value that should be disabled.
418    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
419    *                If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
420    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
421    */
422   public T validateIsOptionDisabled(final SelectUiElement element, final String value, boolean soft) {
423      return validateIsEnabled(element, false, value, soft);
424   }
425
426   private T validateIsEnabled(final SelectUiElement element, boolean shouldBeEnabled, String value, boolean soft) {
427      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Validating whether option " + value + " is "
428            + (shouldBeEnabled ? "enabled" : "disabled") + " in select element " + element);
429      element.before().accept(driver);
430      boolean enabled = selectService.isOptionVisible(element.componentType(), element.locator(), value);
431      element.after().accept(driver);
432      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), enabled);
433
434      String assertionMessage = shouldBeEnabled
435            ? "Validating option is enabled"
436            : "Validating option is disabled";
437
438      if (soft) {
439         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
440               softAssertions -> {
441                  if (shouldBeEnabled) {
442                     softAssertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
443                  } else {
444                     softAssertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
445                  }
446               }
447         );
448      } else {
449         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
450               () -> {
451                  if (shouldBeEnabled) {
452                     Assertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
453                  } else {
454                     Assertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
455                  }
456               }
457         );
458      }
459   }
460
461   /**
462    * Inserts values into a select element.
463    *
464    * @param componentType The component type.
465    * @param locator       The locator of the element.
466    * @param values        The values to insert.
467    */
468   @Override
469   public void insertion(final ComponentType componentType, final By locator, final Object... values) {
470      Allure.step("[UI - Select] Inserting values into select element with component type " + componentType
471                  + " and locator " + locator);
472      selectService.insertion(componentType, locator, values);
473   }
474
475}
